title: How to write & conduct effective performance appraisals. V.2
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Employees - Rating of
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Employees - Rating of
description: Program leader Jimmy Calano provides a seminar presentation where we learn the awful truth about performance appraisals - that they are a responsibility for which most of us were never trained. Provides the manager with a proven, ready-to-use performance appraisal system to help your employees progress in their careers!
